item.description:
Description
Join us to meet people and other dogs for a great cause. I will be walking with my dog Riley, as well as with members from the South Shore Fitness Group and their beloved canine friends. Once I get a count of how many people will be joining us, I will send a final email with my phone #

Registration is $15 and includes a Walk for Animals t-shirt and pet bandana at the event. You do not need to fundraise further unless you want to. When you register, an online fundraising page automatically gets set up for you. To register and collect pledges offline, download a registration/pledge form and mail your completed form to: MSPCA Walk for Animals, 1300 West Elm St. Ext., Brockton, MA 02301

You can click here to register:
http://www.mspca.org/...

The following details are from the MSPCA webpage:

Schedule of events
Sunday, September 7, 2008
Registration: 10:00 a.m.
Walk begins: 11:00 a.m.
Activities and animal contests: 12:30 p.m.
Fundraising and raffle awards: 1:00 p.m.

Event activities
There will be plenty of activities during the day to entertain both dogs and their two-footed friends. On-site entertainment will include:Raffles, prizes and food, contests (including Owner/Dog Look-a-Like, Best Trick, Best Canine Kiss, Mutt of the Year), "Wish I Were Here" board, canine agility demonstrations and trials, Kids? Corner activities and more!

Registration
Registration is 10 a.m. to 11 a.m. Please bring pledge sheets and cash or check donations to the registration tent at Borderland State Park. There is a $15 registration fee.

Route
We will be walking around Leach Pond and enjoying the spectacular scenery that Borderland State Park has to offer. Water stations will be provided.

Directions
For driving directions, call (508) 586 2053.

Dogs
We welcome all dogs that enjoy the company of other dogs. Please be sure your dog is leashed, licensed, in good physical condition and up to date on all vaccinations.

Sunday, September 7th
10 a.m. - 2 p.m.
Borderland State Park, Easton, MA

Register online today by clicking one of the links above and receive a free webpage where you can collect donations and post photos of yourself and your furry teammates. You can register as an individual, join a team or form your own team and recruit friends!
item.how_to_find_us: We will have a small Meetup Sign with a brown australian shepherd and black dog

group.name: The South Shore Dog Lovers Pack Walk

item.name: MSPCA Walk for animals
